plot: 'If the truth sets you free, will it also bring you peace?' Charlie's bittersweet journey touches on our deepest questions of love, spirituality and what it really means to be a friend.
title: Whisper Me a Lullaby
plot_es: 'If the truth sets you free, will it also bring you peace?' Charlie's bittersweet journey touches on our deepest questions of love, spirituality and what it really means to be a friend.
plot_en: 'If the truth sets you free, will it also bring you peace?' Charlie's bittersweet journey touches on our deepest questions of love, spirituality and what it really means to be a friend.
